summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 55th Street from 29th Avenue Northeast to 35th Avenue Northeast, 33rd Avenue Northwest and 34th Avenue Northeast, each from East 55th Street to East 60th Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3864, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
